_: complaining that player failed to enter Pro mission :)
__: something important in the end, as in mission objective bieng over crew heaeds?
___: Or is it some kind of 'I bet we'll be doing something important soon?'
Lines: We got shifted from supporting Operation Odessa
to putting out minor fires in the rear areas,
but I bet it's still something important in the end.
Hmmm. We just received new equipment so I'd
assume there are high expectation of us, right?
Other MS teams and SRT units have suffered
significant losses, so it would appear we
are doing quite well.
It pales in comparison to the activities of the White Base
, which is rumored to be operated by civilians.
Whaaat?! Hoa, you believe those rumors?
Just think about it, it ain't possible.
Is that so? When you integrate various information,
it seems to be true.
Our suits are based on Data from White Base 'Gundam'.
Oh come on, Hoa....
Where in the world do you get such information?
It seems like classified information to me....
Hehehe... its just gathered bit by bit.
Details are trade secrets.
Wow, that's disturbing.
Well, I'll pretend I didn't ask.
MS control software and analytical data of MS combat
have certainly advanced by leaps in last month or two.
I'm actually a fan of that White Base too.
Heh... you could say I am a bit of a fan too...
Anyway!
We have to do well enough to become famous too!
Hahaha, you came out big.
Well, as long as you're still alive,
you've got all the right qualities.
Yes, yes. The war is going to get more and more intense anyway
and there will be more and more dangerous missions.
Let's first focus on surviving them one by one.
Well, well, I am not in such a hurry, ya know?
Anyway, by the end of war I'll as famous as
Zeon's 'Red Comet'!
I'm looking forward to it, Lil.
Well then, Unit 1. Prepare for sortie!
Roger that!
